name: Peace done me.
description:
Hello WORLD!!!
I am DMQK and i create a game (demo version)
Story:
This game about a person, who stuck in dead world.
He has only one attempt to get out of this world.
Help me:
This game has several bugs and flaws.Please find them and write in the comments how you would like to improve this game. Most likely, your idea for improvement will be included in the next beta test and will remain in the game release.

v0.1
-add a game;
v0.2
-add 5 textures (arrow, setuparrow, finish texture, trail texture and triangle texture);
-fixed bugs with collider;
-add a little location with arrows;
